description: Hand-drawn subject-specific sketch illustrations for Past Year Exams cards

imageMapping.Physics: Atom, F=ma, P=F/A, battery, lightning, magnet, gears (blue theme)
imageMapping.Chemistry: Beakers, flasks, NaCl, H₂O, CH₄, periodic table, molecules (green theme)
imageMapping.Biology: DNA double helix, cells, RNA, photosynthesis, microscope (green/lime theme)
